entry.title: Organic cotton flannel pillow cases
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Bed Linens
Price: 34.00 - 74.00 (5 variants)

Treat yourself to a warm hug with our luxurious, ultra-soft organic cotton flannel bedlinens. Workshop crafted in Vancouver, Canada with thick, double-side brushed organic flannel. Also available in sleepwear for him or her. Machine wash cold. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or line dry.

entry.title: Organic cotton flannel Duvet Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Bed Linens
Price: 189.00 - 259.00 (4 variants)

Treat yourself to a warm cuddle with our luxurious, ultra-soft organic cotton flannel duvet cover.  Workshop crafted in Vancouver, Canada with thick, double-side brushed organic flannel. Also available in sleepwear for him or her. Machine wash cold. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or line dry.

entry.title: "Mariner" organic cotton sateen sheets & sets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Bed Linens
Price: 129.00 - 359.00 (12 variants)

Made in Canada from 100% certified organic cotton sateen, lab tested non-toxic.  Machine wash in cold water with gentle detergent, line dry or tumble dry low.
  • Healthy
  • Non-toxic
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Eco-friendly
  • Comfortable
  • Breathable
  • Durable
  • 250 threadcount, ideal woven construction for softness and durability
  • Crafted in-house in Canada by Dream Designs

    Available in pillowcases, pillow shams, fitted sheets, flat sheets, sheet sets, duvet covers, and duvet cover sets.  

    Sheet set Includes 1 fitted sheet, 1 flat sheet, and 1 pair of standard pillowcases.  

    Duvet cover set includes 1 duvet cover and 1 pair of standard pillow shams.

    Custom sizes available.  Please email us at info@dreamdesigns.ca to inquire.

entry.title: Deep Pocket Sheet Organic Cotton Sateen 280tc Assorted Colour
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs (Tax ID: 133893164)
Type: Bed Linens
Price: 139.00 - 189.00 (96 variants)

Made in Canada in small batches from 100% certified organic cotton 280tc sateen, lab tested non-toxic.  Fit 18" depth mattress.  Due to the width of the fabric, some items may have seams in the middle.  Machine wash in cold water with gentle detergent, line dry or tumble dry low.

  • Healthy

entry.title: "Heartfelt" Organic Bedding Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Bed Linens
Price: 249.00 - 649.00 (6 variants)

An all organic cotton collection that is clean, bright and fun.  

All items are made in Canada with 100% organic cotton 280tc sateen.  Machine washable with mild detergent in cold water, line dry or tumble dry low. 

  • Healthy
  • Non-toxic
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Eco-friendly
  • Comfortable
  • Breathable
  • Durable
  • Well made in Canada

The pillowcases and shams are in standard size.  Decorative cushions are sold separately.
